# Vestraadi Magic Items
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Vestraadi|vestraadi]] magic items introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---

- [[Slicked Boots]]
- [[Whip of the Current]]
